chart.title: Total number of people affected by storms per 100,000
chart.subtitle: Storms include tornado, hail, thunderstorm, sand storm, blizzards and extreme wind events. The total number of people affected is the sum of injured, requiring assistance and homeless.
chart.note: Data includes disasters recorded up to October 2025.
